name: Late From a Hurricane!
description:
---------------------In Development Still---------------------------

You are going to be late for work and to make matters worst, your house is a disaster from a storm! You must find your way back into your house and get your stuff for work! 

This game is a puzzle game where you need to find a way to get into your home by using items to help you get in and then locate objects in your house like your lunch and car keys. To move use the WASD key, to jump use the space bar, and left mouse button to click on objects and doors.

Credits:

Alexa Kripli from DAGD 345 has created the bush trimmer 3D model for the game.

Mason Dudaryk has created the garage door remote 3D model for the game.

Nick Pattison helped with teaching us coding methods and styles in order to make our game.

I wrote all of the code and designed the map of the game. Furthermore, I made the current UI.

This game is for Global Game Jam and a project for DAGD 255 class. It will be worked on still after GGJ.
